#summary Recent changes
#labels Featured

1.1.1 (2007-03-07)

  * Fixed race condition which caused the LEDs to show the start color at the end of a really short test run. Contributed by Nick Hofstede. ([http://code.google.com/p/eclipse-xps/issues/detail?id=9 Issue 9])

1.1.0 (2007-03-03) 

  * Added documentation and context sensitive help. ([http://code.google.com/p/eclipse-xps/issues/detail?id=6 Issue 6])
  * Added support to preview the selected colors. ([http://code.google.com/p/eclipse-xps/issues/detail?id=5 Issue 5])
  * Added support to choose the LEDs' brightness. ([http://code.google.com/p/eclipse-xps/issues/detail?id=4 Issue 4])
  * Added support to pulsate (glow) LEDs during a test run. ([http://code.google.com/p/eclipse-xps/issues/detail?id=3 Issue 3])
  * Added support to choose which LEDs should show test results. ([http://code.google.com/p/eclipse-xps/issues/detail?id=2 Issue 2])
  * Added support to turn LEDs off (after a certain period) when a test run has finished. ([http://code.google.com/p/eclipse-xps/issues/detail?id=1 Issue 1])

1.0.0 (2007-01-08) 

  * Initial release.
